papers.title: Lessons Learned from the B-Factories and Implications for a High-luminosity Circular e+e− Higgs Factory
authors: the orbit feedback at IP and the luminosity tuning at KEKB are described. An emphasis is placed on the beam instrumentations and the beam control.
An overview on some of the major challenges for beam instrumentation and diagnostics for large ring colliders is given. In the Introduction the general challenges are listed
independent of particle type and accelerator specifics. After a short LHC introduction
examples from the LHC experience are presented
and to the present upgrade and improvement efforts
made during the long shutdown 1. A list
of relevant beam instrumentation R&D activities closes this summary
